Label: Geotail Comprehensive Plasma Inst (CPI), Definitive Solar Wind Analyzer (SWA) Moments (U. Iowa)

VariableDescription.Name: SW_V
VariableDescription.LongDescription: Ion bulk flow velocity (SWA), 3 GSE polar components
VariableDescription.Header:
#              ************************************
#              *****    GLOBAL ATTRIBUTES    ******
#              ************************************
#
#     PROJECT                         ISTP>International Solar-Terrestrial Physics
#     DISCIPLINE                      Space Physics>Magnetospheric Science
#     SOURCE_NAME                     GEOTAIL>Geomagnetic Tail
#     DATA_TYPE                       H0>SWA Definitive Moments
#     DESCRIPTOR                      CPI>Comprehensive Plasma Instrumentation
#     DATA_VERSION                    6
#     TITLE                           Geotail CPI
#     ADID_REF                        NSSD0091
#     TEXT                            Version 6 data processing replaced version 5 processing for data after March                           
#     TEXT                             10, 2006, when the CPI team started using 64 energy steps per spectrum instead                        
#     TEXT                             of the previously used 32 steps per spectrum.  The change was made to ensure                          
#     TEXT                             that even for very cold flows, the spectrum would have a sufficient number                            
#     TEXT                             of significant points to derive moments.  The change resulted in 96s spectra                          
#                                      and 96s-resolution moments, vs. 48s previously.                                                       
#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 GE_H0_CPI_00000000_V06
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  GE_H0_CPI
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      Geotail Comprehensive Plasma Inst (CPI), Definitive Solar Wind Analyzer (SWA)                          
#                                      Moments                                                                                               
#     PI_NAME                         L. Frank/W. Patterson
#     PI_AFFILIATION                  U. Iowa
#     MISSION_GROUP                   Geotail
#                                     !___Magnetospheric Data
#                                     !___Interplanetary Data near 1 AU
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Plasma and Solar Wind
#     ALT_LOGICAL_SOURCE              Geotail_CPI_Plasma-H0_45sec_cdf
#
#              ************************************
#              ****  RECORD VARYING VARIABLES  ****
#              ************************************
#
#  1. Time, centered, in NSSDC Epoch
#  2. Ion bulk flow velocity (SWA), 3 GSE polar components
#
#  
# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.
# Generated by CDAWeb on: Thu Jan 15 18:04:21 2015
VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#
CDF_EPOCH                            SWA_ION_V          SWA_ION_THETA            SWA_ION_PHI
                                (@_SWA Ion V_)     (@_SWA Ion Theta_)       (@_SWA Ion Phi_)
dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss.ms                    km/s                    deg                    deg
28-09-1992 00:00:34.595           -1.00000E+31           -1.00000E+31           -1.00000E+31

VariableDescription.Name: SW_Vc

#     DESCRIPTOR                      CPI>Comprehensive Plasma Instrumentation
#     DATA_VERSION                    6
#     TITLE                           Geotail CPI
#     ADID_REF                        NSSD0091
#     TEXT                            Version 6 data processing replaced version 5 processing for data after March                           
#     TEXT                             10, 2006, when the CPI team started using 64 energy steps per spectrum instead                        
#     TEXT                             of the previously used 32 steps per spectrum.  The change was made to ensure                          
#     TEXT                             that even for very cold flows, the spectrum would have a sufficient number                            
#     TEXT                             of significant points to derive moments.  The change resulted in 96s spectra                          
#                                      and 96s-resolution moments, vs. 48s previously.                                                       
#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 GE_H0_CPI_00000000_V06
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  GE_H0_CPI
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      Geotail Comprehensive Plasma Inst (CPI), Definitive Solar Wind Analyzer (SWA)                          
#                                      Moments                                                                                               
#     PI_NAME                         L. Frank/W. Patterson
#     PI_AFFILIATION                  U. Iowa
#     MISSION_GROUP                   Geotail
#                                     !___Magnetospheric Data
#                                     !___Interplanetary Data near 1 AU
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Plasma and Solar Wind

#  1. Time, centered, in NSSDC Epoch
#  2. Ion bulk flow velocity (SWA), 3 GSE cartesian components

VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#
CDF_EPOCH                       SWA_ION_VX_GSE         SWA_ION_VY_GSE         SWA_ION_VZ_GSE
                                        (@_x_)                 (@_y_)                 (@_z_)
dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss.ms                  km/sec                 km/sec                 km/sec
28-09-1992 00:00:34.595           -1.00000E+31           -1.00000E+31           -1.00000E+31

VariableDescription.Name: SW_T

#     DISCIPLINE                      Space Physics>Magnetospheric Science
#     SOURCE_NAME                     GEOTAIL>Geomagnetic Tail
#     DATA_TYPE                       H0>SWA Definitive Moments
#     DESCRIPTOR                      CPI>Comprehensive Plasma Instrumentation
#     DATA_VERSION                    6
#     TITLE                           Geotail CPI
#     ADID_REF                        NSSD0091
#     TEXT                            Version 6 data processing replaced version 5 processing for data after March                           
#     TEXT                             10, 2006, when the CPI team started using 64 energy steps per spectrum instead                        
#     TEXT                             of the previously used 32 steps per spectrum.  The change was made to ensure                          
#     TEXT                             that even for very cold flows, the spectrum would have a sufficient number                            
#     TEXT                             of significant points to derive moments.  The change resulted in 96s spectra                          
#                                      and 96s-resolution moments, vs. 48s previously.                                                       
#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 GE_H0_CPI_00000000_V06
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  GE_H0_CPI

#                                     !___Magnetospheric Data

#              ************************************

#  1. Time, centered, in NSSDC Epoch
#  2. Kinetic Temperature of Hydrogen component of solar wind, scalar
#       NOTES:  calculated by integrating the distribution function

# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.
# Generated by CDAWeb on: Thu Jan 15 18:04:22 2015
VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#       NOTES:  calculated by integrating the distribution function
#
CDF_EPOCH                SWA_ION_TEMP
dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss.ms         Kelvin
28-09-1992 00:00:34.595  -1.00000E+31

VariableDescription.Name: SW_P_Den
VariableDescription.Header:
#              ************************************
#              *****    GLOBAL ATTRIBUTES    ******
#              ************************************
#
#     PROJECT                         ISTP>International Solar-Terrestrial Physics
#     DISCIPLINE                      Space Physics>Magnetospheric Science
#     SOURCE_NAME                     GEOTAIL>Geomagnetic Tail
#     DATA_TYPE                       H0>SWA Definitive Moments
#     DESCRIPTOR                      CPI>Comprehensive Plasma Instrumentation
#     DATA_VERSION                    6
#     TITLE                           Geotail CPI
#     ADID_REF                        NSSD0091
#     TEXT                            Version 6 data processing replaced version 5 processing for data after March                           
#     TEXT                             10, 2006, when the CPI team started using 64 energy steps per spectrum instead                        
#     TEXT                             of the previously used 32 steps per spectrum.  The change was made to ensure                          
#     TEXT                             that even for very cold flows, the spectrum would have a sufficient number                            
#     TEXT                             of significant points to derive moments.  The change resulted in 96s spectra                          
#                                      and 96s-resolution moments, vs. 48s previously.                                                       
#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 GE_H0_CPI_00000000_V06
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  GE_H0_CPI
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      Geotail Comprehensive Plasma Inst (CPI), Definitive Solar Wind Analyzer (SWA)                          
#                                      Moments                                                                                               
#     PI_NAME                         L. Frank/W. Patterson
#     PI_AFFILIATION                  U. Iowa
#     MISSION_GROUP                   Geotail
#                                     !___Magnetospheric Data
#                                     !___Interplanetary Data near 1 AU
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Plasma and Solar Wind
#     ALT_LOGICAL_SOURCE              Geotail_CPI_Plasma-H0_45sec_cdf
#
#              ************************************
#              ****  RECORD VARYING VARIABLES  ****
#              ************************************
#
#  1. Time, centered, in NSSDC Epoch
#  2. Ion number density (SWA), scalar
#       NOTES:  Assuming no helium (0.3 - several hundred) if the density is less than 0.3/cc the higher moments (VEL,TEMP) shall not be used because of the poor counting statistics.
#
#  
# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.
# Generated by CDAWeb on: Thu Jan 15 18:04:23 2015
VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#       NOTES:  Assuming no helium (0.3 - several hundred) if the density is less than 0.3/cc the higher moments (VEL,TEMP) shall not be used because of the poor counting statistics.
#
CDF_EPOCH                   SWA_ION_N
dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss.ms            /cc
28-09-1992 00:00:34.595     0.0896000

VariableDescription.Name: SW_Pressure
VariableDescription.LongDescription: Ion Pressure (assuming protons measured and adding 5% alphas, from SWA), scalar
VariableDescription.Header:
#              ************************************
#              *****    GLOBAL ATTRIBUTES    ******
#              ************************************
#
#     PROJECT                         ISTP>International Solar-Terrestrial Physics
#     DISCIPLINE                      Space Physics>Magnetospheric Science
#     SOURCE_NAME                     GEOTAIL>Geomagnetic Tail
#     DATA_TYPE                       H0>SWA Definitive Moments
#     DESCRIPTOR                      CPI>Comprehensive Plasma Instrumentation
#     DATA_VERSION                    6
#     TITLE                           Geotail CPI
#     ADID_REF                        NSSD0091
#     TEXT                            Version 6 data processing replaced version 5 processing for data after March                           
#     TEXT                             10, 2006, when the CPI team started using 64 energy steps per spectrum instead                        
#     TEXT                             of the previously used 32 steps per spectrum.  The change was made to ensure                          
#     TEXT                             that even for very cold flows, the spectrum would have a sufficient number                            
#     TEXT                             of significant points to derive moments.  The change resulted in 96s spectra                          
#                                      and 96s-resolution moments, vs. 48s previously.                                                       
#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 GE_H0_CPI_00000000_V06
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  GE_H0_CPI
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      Geotail Comprehensive Plasma Inst (CPI), Definitive Solar Wind Analyzer (SWA)                          
#                                      Moments                                                                                               
#     PI_NAME                         L. Frank/W. Patterson
#     PI_AFFILIATION                  U. Iowa
#     MISSION_GROUP                   Geotail
#                                     !___Magnetospheric Data
#                                     !___Interplanetary Data near 1 AU
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Plasma and Solar Wind
#     ALT_LOGICAL_SOURCE              Geotail_CPI_Plasma-H0_45sec_cdf
#
#              ************************************
#              ****  RECORD VARYING VARIABLES  ****
#              ************************************
#
#  1. Time, centered, in NSSDC Epoch
#  2. Ion Pressure (assuming protons measured and adding 5% alphas, from SWA), scalar
#       NOTES:  Assuming Vp = Va, P = C * Np * mp * Vp*Vp * [1 + 4(.05)]. mp = 1.67 * 10^(-27), C = 10^(21), Np in #/cc, Vp in km/s. Pressure not provided for density less than 0.3/cc because of the poor counting statistics.
#
#  
# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.
# Generated by CDAWeb on: Thu Jan 15 18:04:23 2015
VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#       NOTES:  Assuming Vp = Va, P = C * Np * mp * Vp*Vp * [1 + 4(.05)]. mp = 1.67 * 10^(-27), C = 10^(21), Np in #/cc, Vp in km/s. Pressure not provided for density less than 0.3/cc because of the poor counting statistics.
#
CDF_EPOCH                   SWA_ION_P
dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss.ms            nPa
28-09-1992 00:00:34.595  -1.00000E+31
